column2: ggplot(plot1, mapping = aes(x = Freq, y = reorder(Var1, Freq))) + geom_col(fill = "orange", width = 0.5) + labs(x = "Jumlah", y = "Kategori", title = "Jumlah Penjualan Berdasarkan Kategori") + theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust=1)) + geom_text(aes(label=Freq), col = 'white', nudge_x = -7)
